text: @matthewamiller First, what role does #WilliamBarr have in fighting #coronavirus anyway, and second, doesn't #Trump & #Pence say #COVID19 is past? No problem, nothing to see, that's why can hold massive rally in arena. #TrumpUnfit4POTUS #voteBLUEtoSaveAmerica
